New Records: Domantas Sabonis set a franchise-record 28 rebounds
Key Match Events: Sacramento Kings used a dominant fourth quarter to win 114-97 over the Boston Celtics
The game was tied at 76 after three quarters
Sacramento took command with a 24-9 run in the fourth quarter
The Kings outscored the Celtics 38-21 over the final 12 minutes
Miscellaneous Highlights: The victory extended Sacramento's season-high win streak to six games
Sabonis' 33rd double-double of the season and 24th game of his career with 20 or more rebounds
Others: Domantas Sabonis surpassed his own franchise record of 26 rebounds
Chris Webber also had 26 boards against Indiana on January 5, 2001
